en.name: Who We Are
en.brochure_title: The Best Care Your Pet Deserves!
en.brochure_description: At Vet Help, we provide world-class veterinary care because your pet's health is our responsibility.

brochure_list.text: Certified veterinarians with Canadian board accreditation.
State-of-the-art medical equipment for precise diagnosis andeffective treatment.
Fully equipped operating rooms including Inhalation anesthesia suitable for all ages with no side effects.
24-hour inpatient rooms with continuous medical supervision.
24/7 customer service to support Emergency cases.

en.name: Services
en.services_description: We care about your petâ€™s well-being and provide medical services in a loving and reassuring environment.

services_services.title: Preventive Vaccinations
services_services.description: Protect your pet from diseases with essential shots.

services_services.title: Full Boarding Services
services_services.description: Give your pet a safe and comfortable stay.

services_services.title: Cosmetic Surgeries
services_services.description: Safe enhancements for your petâ€™s appearance.

services_services.title: Home Visits
services_services.description: Quality veterinary care at your doorstep for comfort.

services_services.title: Diagnostic Imaging (X-rays & Ultrasound)
services_services.description: Get accurate insights into your petâ€™s health with advanced imaging.

services_services.title: Dental Care
services_services.description: Keep your petâ€™s teeth clean and healthy.

services_services.title: Medical Diagnostics
services_services.description: Detect health issues early with comprehensive checkups.

services_services.title: Check-ups & Assessments
services_services.description: Regular health evaluations for early issue detection.

services_services.title: Surgical Procedures
services_services.description: Advanced treatments for various medical needs.

services_services.title: Personalized Care (routine and care)
services_services.description: Tailored treatments to meet your petâ€™s unique needs.

services_services.title: Pet Passports Issuance
services_services.description: Travel hassle-free with official pet documentation.

services_services.title: Orthopedic Surgeries
services_services.description: Expert care for bone and joint conditions.

en.counters_title: The Perfect Choice for Your Beloved Pet

ar.name: Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø°Ø§ Ù†Ø­Ù†

en.name: Reviews
en.reviews_title: Hear it from Vet Help Friends

reviews_reviews.name: Rehab Elsharkawy
reviews_reviews.text: I rushed my beloved pet to the hospital in critical conditionâ€”severe poisoning, nonstop regurgitation, diarrhea, tremors, and pneumonia. I feared for his life as he worsened. With daily visits, continuous treatments, and the care of amazing doctors, he slowly recovered. Grateful beyond words!

reviews_reviews.name: Hager Hassan
reviews_reviews.text: Praise be to God, Lord of the Worlds, my cat has lost weight and is still looking goodI really want to thank Dr. Noha, the utmost in good attitude and politeness. She tolerated me when I was fanatical. My cat had severe allergies to the point of his skin. My foal was as old as they were. They treated the animal with mercy and were very careful.

reviews_reviews.name: Bahira Samaan
reviews_reviews.text: I was searching for a vet to come at home to check my dog as we couldn't move it as she stopped eating , Dr Ahmed replied our call and arrived at home to check it and even took it with him to the clinic to be able to make the necessary X rays and blood test.  he kept it at his side to follow up on it and the medication till I received it again after 6 days healthy and in good condition.

reviews_reviews.name: Mariem Sabry
reviews_reviews.text: I was searching for a vet to come at home to check my dog as we couldn't move it as she stopped eating , Dr Ahmed replied our call and arrived at home to check it and even took it with him to the clinic to be able to make the necessary X rays and blood test.  he kept it at his side to follow up on it and the medication till I received it again after 6 days healthy and in good condition.

reviews_reviews.name: Rehab Farouk
reviews_reviews.text: Good evening, I honestly do not know how to thank you for your standing with me and Fellah, and everyone who is with you is all good, especially Dr. Ahmed, and God willing, you will return safely, and Fella and I will thank you for your good taste, mercy, and humanity, and may God compensate for your trouble with goodness, God willing.

reviews_reviews.name: Ahmed Mohamed
reviews_reviews.text: They are Very professional doctors, and very helpful. They treated our pets with a lot of kind and love. I would recommend the vet for everyone.

reviews_reviews.name: Rehab Elsharkawy
reviews_reviews.text: I rushed my beloved pet to the hospital in critical conditionâ€”severe poisoning, nonstop regurgitation, diarrhea, tremors, and pneumonia. I feared for his life as he worsened. With daily visits, continuous treatments, and the care of amazing doctors, he slowly recovered. Grateful beyond words!

en.name: Get In Touch
